messages.subject: ezzo, etc
messages.msgSnippet: Faith, Do not be sorry to post your beliefs and views!  I for one do not agree with everything said on any of the lists I belong to!  You stated your beliefs
messages.messageBody:
Faith,
Do not be sorry to post your beliefs and views!� I for one do not agree with everything said on any of the lists I belong to!� You stated your beliefs in
a very pleasant, informative way.� I did not think it was offensive in anyway.� I do not agree with the whole method, etc., but it was informative and
interesting to learn about the different ways people do raise their children.

I am on digest so I am behind--to the person who was looking for something about Pagans, there is Many-Paths at onelist, if you are interested.� Very
good, IMO.
�Andi
�
